[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
ObserverMode
enum ObserverMode {...}

Observer modes

Values
OBS_ENTERING

(-1) Player in the process of entering observer mode

OBS_NONE

(0) Player not in observer mode

OBS_CHASE_LOCKED

(3) Chase locked

OBS_CHASE_FREE

(1) Free movement

OBS_ROAMING

(2) Roaming
